dcterms:creator: JS Garofolo
LF Lamel
WM Fisher
JG Fiscus
DS Pallett
NL Dahlgren
dcterms:description: The TIMIT Speech corpus is large enough to be a reasonable acoustic modeling benchmark for speech recognition, focusing on the frame-wise classification task where the objective is to classify each audio-frame as one of 61 phones.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:creator: Marcus Liwicki
Horst Bunke
dcterms:description: The IAM Online Handwriting Database consists of English sentences as time series of pen movements that have to be mapped to characters, with a focus on character error rate measurement.
dcterms:title: IAM Online

dcterms:creator: Nicolas Boulanger-Lewandowski
Yoshua Bengio
Pascal Vincent
dcterms:description: JSB Chorales is a collection of 382 four-part harmonized chorales by J. S. Bach, used for next-step prediction by minimizing the negative log-likelihood.
dcterms:title: JSB Chorales
